articles.title: Sale of Burger King South Africa blocked over lack of black ownership - News24
articles.description: The Competition Commission has prohibited a proposed takeover of Burger King in South Africa.
articles.content:
• The Competition Commission has prohibited a proposed takeover of Burger King in South Africa.
  • It objected to the lack of historically disadvantaged persons among the new owners.

articles.title: SA's unemployment rate rises to a 13-year high - IOL
articles.description: South Africa’s unemployment rate rose to a 13-year high after ticking up slightly to 32.6 percent in the first quarter of 2021, from 32.5 percent in the fourth quarter of 2020.
